alert.note: Alert for Russell (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 8:03PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Russell County through 830 PM CST... At 803 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Uchee, or near Hurtsboro, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hurtsboro, Ladonia, Russell County Sports Complex, Uchee, Seale, Hatchechubbe, Fort Mitchell, Phenix Drag Strip, Parkmanville and Ladonia Sports Complex. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
